DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy safety CSTC1 patient diabetic foot ulcer .
DOC.brief_title: CSTC1 Diabetic Foot Ulcers Phase II Study
DOC.criteria: With either gender age least 20 year old ; With diabetic ulcer ( define target ulcer ) foot heal least 2 week ; The target ulcer classify grade 1 2 ulcer accord modify Wagner system ; The target ulcer show `` infection control '' investigator 's discretion ; Subject free necrosis infection soft bone tissue ; Subject sign write informed consent form With active osteomyelitis ; With target ulcer size decrease least 50 % least 2 week standardofcareonly period record regular therapy Randomization visit ; With poor nutritional status ( albumin < 3g/dl ) , poor diabetic control ( HbA1c > 12 % ) , anemia ( hemoglobin < 10 g/dL ) , leukocyte count < 1,000/mm3 , abnormal liver function ( AST , ALT > 3 x upper limit normal range ) ; Requiring treatment corticosteroid , immunosuppressive chemotherapeutic agent ; Presence necrosis , purulence sinus tracts remove debridement ; Receiving revascularization surgery perform < 8 week entry study ; With know suspected hypersensitivity ingredient study product vehicle ; With coronary heart disease myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) within 3 month prior study ; Pregnant lactate premenopausal childbearing potential take reliable contraceptive method ( ) study period ; Enrollment investigational drug trial within 4 week enter study ; With uncontrolled illness judge investigator enter trial may detrimental subject .
